work.title: Veratrak - Logo, branding and website
work.content: We were asked to create an identity for their upcoming launch which involved a logo and a website.

work.title: 3DUX Wordpress Website
work.content: For 3DUX, we created a bespoke Wordpress theme. This theme needed a login area where clients could request to see their more sensitive work.

work.title: Velvet Trumpet Wordpress Website
work.content: Velvet Trumpet asks us to design and build their website. Originally a brochure site, this later was moved onto Wordpress.

work.title: Wasp Plumbing SEO
work.content: Wasp Plumbing came to us to improve their search engine presence. We used markup to identify to search engine the details about their business and gave consultancy advice on how they can enhance their presence
